subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Justin Thomas, 17, set a course record with a seven-under-par 65 to lead the 35th Junior P.G.A. Championship by one stroke midway through the first round.
snippet: Justin Thomas, 17, set a course record with a seven-under-par 65 to lead the 35th Junior P.G.A. Championship by one stroke midway through the first round.
